title: Average spend of eating out for lunch in the U.S. 2015
summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Days, and Average cost in U.S. dollars in each Days on the y axis.
The Average cost in U.S. dollars is highest at Days Per year and lowest at Days Per day.
The difference of Average cost in U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Days is 1031.86.
min_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Days, and Average cost in U.S. dollars in each Days on the y axis.
The Average cost in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Days Per year and lowest at Days Per day.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 3 columns on the x axis representing Days, and Average cost in U.S. dollars in each Days on the y axis.
The Average cost in U.S. dollars is highest at Days Per year and lowest at Days Per day.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Days in the x axis and Average cost in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Average cost in U.S. dollars is highest at Days Per year and lowest at Days Per day.
The second highest Average cost in U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Days Per week.
The difference of Average cost in U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Days is 1031.86.
The highest value 1043.0 at Per year is almost 2.91 times larger than the average value 358.06.
The Average cost in U.S. dollars is 1074.19 if we add up values of all Dayss.
